twn.lang

Class Property.PropertyContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • twn.lang.Property.PropertyContainer
  • Enclosing class:
    Property<T>

    public abstract static class Property.PropertyContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class PropertyContainer is supposed to be derived by any other class that uses the Property class. It will provide an event lock, an containerChanged event and will automatically register to all valueChanged events. And fire it's own propertyChanged, when one property changes. Therefore the derived class should call initProperty after all it's fields of class Property are initialized.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Event<Property.PropertyChangedArgs> propertyChanged
      The property changed event.
